name: Not Your Mama's Autobattler
description:
Build a team of elite gladiators, each with unique weapons, equipment and skills. Then face off against your friends or find competitors online.

Compete in one of two modes.

SURVIVAL
Play at your own pace. When you are ready automatically connect to an opponent and duke it out. Start with ten hearts. As the game progresses, with each loss you will lose more and more hearts. Choose wisely. Win big. Then show off your victory in the weekly leaderboard.

TOURNAMENT
Assemble your friends or queue up for a 10 player match and battle it out. You are under the clock. Every decision matters. Choose your next battle location strategically to maximize your victory points. The first player to 10 points wins.
